dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Holly Griesser [mailto:AV4database@charter.net] 
Sent: Friday, December 23, 2005 12:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement



December 23, 2005

 

George Poletes, Corporate Counsel

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

copyright@theplanet.com

 

Re: Notification of Claimed Infringement by MBA - Marketing Business
Assistant, a customer

 

 

Dear Sir:

 

I am writing to inform you that I believe that I have found one of
ThePlanet.com's customers, MBA - Marketing Business Assistant, headed by
Stan Clausson, is infringing upon my copyrights. As recommended in your
Acceptable Use Policy (AUP) and Copyright Notifications webpages, located at
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html and
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html, respectively, I am making
this written notification available to you via electronic mail and United
States Postal Service. From reading the aforementioned pages, I see that
your requirements closely follow Title 17 USC 512(c)(3)(A) and so will use
that convention to enumerate my claim. 

 

Title 17 USC 512(c)(3)(A):

(i) A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

Please accept my electronic signature below, with physical signature
arriving soon by United States Postal Service

 

(ii) Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed,
or, if multiple copyrighted works at a single online site are covered by a
single notification, a representative list of such works at that site.

 

The work that is being infringed is the data table produced by me and
marketed through the website at http://www.avonwithholly.com
<http://www.avonwithholly.com/> .

 

(iii) Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to
be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to
which is to be disabled, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to locate the material.

 

MBA - Marketing Business Assistant has on its website, located at
http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,cat_view
/gid,18/Itemid,26/ commonly referred to as "the Downloads area,
Pricelists/Brochures, Avon - USA", the following infringing works (direct
URLs enclosed):

1.        USA_4-12.zip
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,54/Itemid,26/) 

2.        2006-01.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,56/Itemid,26/) 

3.        2005-26.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,50/Itemid,26/) 

4.        2005-25.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,46/Itemid,26/) 

5.        2005-24.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,44/Itemid,26/) 

6.        2005-23.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,40/) 

7.        2005-22.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,38/) 

8.        2005-21.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,35/) 

9.        2005-20.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,33/) 

10.        2005-19.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,26/) 

11.        2005-18.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,22/) 

12.        2005-17.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,19/) 

13.        2005-16.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,16/) 

14.        2005-15.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,8/) 

15.        2005-14.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,5/) 

16.        2005-13.tps
(http://marketing-assistant.com/mba/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_dow
nload/gid,4/) 

 

(iv) Information reasonably sufficient to permit the service provider to
contact the complaining party, such as an address, telephone number, and, if
available, an electronic mail address at which the complaining party may be
contacted.




Holly Griesser

6414 Long Ivy Way

Sugar Hill GA 30518

(678) 641-6372

AV4database@charter.net

 

(v) A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that use
of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

 

I provide a convenience service where I create a data table for a database
and then license the use of that data table to subscribers of my service.
Re-distribution of that creation, in whole or in part, is not allowed under
my license as viewed at http://www.avonwithholly.com/html/terms_of_use.html
item 12 nor under my purchase agreement as viewed at
http://www.avonwithholly.com/html/purchase_agreement.html. The
aforementioned files have been copied, in whole or in part, from my creation
as evidenced by an intentional construction placed within one of the most
recent data tables.

 

(vi) A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

I attest that this information is accurate to the best of my knowledge and
own the copyright to the data table upon which this complaint is based.

 

I am currently researching the method in which Mr. Clausson obtains my work
and am taking measures to prevent its future, unauthorized use. I would
request that my personal information is not shared with anyone other than
members of ThePlanet.com's staff, employed or under contract, in the due
course of satisfying this Notification, and then only on an as needed basis.

 

Also, as I produce new data tables at the frequency of about one (1) every
two (2) weeks and until I conclude my investigation into the method(s) by
which my work is being compromised, I include those possible future
infringing works within this document by reference.

 

 

Regards,

 

 

 

 

Holly J Griesser
